meanings.definition: Nanobots: tiny robots designed to perform specific tasks at the nanoscale.
meanings.sent1: The nanobots were programmed to clean up pollution in the water.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are researching how nanobots can target cancer cells effectively.
meanings.sent3: The nanobots decided to have a dance party in the petri dish.
meanings.sent4: The nanobots worked tirelessly, like diligent ants in a miniature world.
meanings.sent5: Imagine a swarm of nanobots repairing damaged tissues inside your body.

meanings.definition: Nanobots: microscopic machines that can be programmed to carry out various functions within the body.
meanings.sent1: Tiny nanobots were injected into the patient's bloodstream to deliver medication.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are exploring the potential of nanobots for targeted drug delivery.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous nanobots played hide-and-seek in the laboratory.
meanings.sent4: The nanobots moved through the body like silent messengers of health.
meanings.sent5: Visualize a fleet of nanobots repairing damaged tissues inside your body.
